<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Populate cost_plan actuals from cost_plan_breakdown actuals, when cost_plan actuals is zero or empty</description>
        <name>Populate cost_plan actual from breakdown</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function populateCostPlanBreakdownActuals() {
    var costPlanGr = new GlideRecord('cost_plan');
	if (costPlanGr.isValidField('actual_cost_default_currency')){
		costPlanGr.addEncodedQuery('actual_cost_default_currency=NULL^ORactual_cost_default_currency=0');
		costPlanGr.query();
		var cpBdGr;

		while(costPlanGr.next()){
			cpBdGr = new GlideAggregate('cost_plan_breakdown');
			cpBdGr.addQuery('breakdown_type','requirement');
			cpBdGr.addQuery('cost_plan',costPlanGr.getUniqueValue());
			cpBdGr.addAggregate('SUM','actual');
			cpBdGr.setGroup(false);
			cpBdGr.query();
			if (cpBdGr.next()) {
				if (cpBdGr.getAggregate('SUM','actual') != 0) {
				costPlanGr.setValue('actual_cost_default_currency',cpBdGr.getAggregate('SUM','actual'));
				costPlanGr.update();
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
populateCostPlanBreakdownActuals();]]></script>
